bin-folder_key2: /usr/bin folder in linux isn't the recycle bin jo shayad aapne kabhi windows mei dekha hoga
bin-folder_key3: bin ka yaha matlab binary files se hota hai. jo aapke programs hai, jo execute kiye ja sakte hai linux ke alawa, woh yaha par store hote hai.
bin-folder_key4: Dekhiye kya aapko koi familiar names dikhayi de rahe hai?
bin-folder_key5: Iss folder mei jo bhi executable files hongi, woh aap kahi se bhi sirf uss file ka naam likh kar execute kar sakte ho. Hum aage aisa ek program banayenge.
bin-folder_key7: ke contents ko samajh kar, observe kariye, ki kya contents hai, aur in mei se koi commands/programs/executables aapne kabhi use kiye hai kya?
bin-folder_key8:
Note:
Jo bhi file executable hogi, uss file ki permission mei aapko 'x' character dikhega ls -l karnei par.
